text:
Reviving an old idea of <@U54TVT3C1>’s.

In the page editor when editing a custom module that has a repeater field. it would be nice if there were a “back” link below the  fields that does the same as the one at the of the repeated fields.

I tried at one point to move that link using the chrome extension but due to the different types of fields and how many fields can be in there it wasn’t practical to use the extension to resolve the problem.
